name: Student's Notion Setup
description: Hey, there fellow students!As someone who has struggled with staying organized in university, I created a comprehensive Notion setup to simplify my life and I'm excited to share it with you.With this organized dashboard, you'll have everything you need in one place to keep track of your courses, class notes, assessments, and tasks.Here's a quick rundown of what's included:⚡ All Classes: A table to keep track of all the classes you've taken, with different views to filter by semester.⚡ Class Note
